list.abs: the child's misery would move even the most obdurate heart .这个孩子的不幸甚至可以感动最冷酷的心。
He remained obdurate , refusing to alter his decision ., 他依然固执己见 , 拒不改变决定.
or , lord , if too obdurate i ., 主啊 , 我是否太执迷不悟.
Entrenched prejudices , obdurate opinions as sterile as no opinions at all ., 固有的偏见 , 执拗的观点与没有观点一样贫瘠可怜.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
